name: Mange Tout (Snow Peas)
properties: Retains bright green color when properly cooked
benefits: Mange tout are water-rich, low-calorie vegetables that provide fiber, vitamins, and minerals. Their high water content and low calorie density make them ideal for weight loss. Best prepared by brief steaming or blanching to preserve nutrients and color.
amount: Part of vegetable servings, typically 1-2 cups

quotes: Add the mange tout and bean sprouts and cook until the mange tout turn bright green, about 1 minute longer.
